title: Gab & Juls Show: Was Barça too predictable against Inter?
description:
Gab Marcotti and Julien Laurens break down Barcelona's 1-0 defeat against Inter Milan in the Champions League, and ask whether Xavi's tactics were to blame for the defeat. The guys also discuss Chelsea's 3-0 win over AC Milan, Napoli's 6-1 victory over Ajax & why cities in France won't show the World Cup in public spaces this year.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Barça fall behind in the group; Champions League roundup; World Cup boycotts
